thread.title: Luann
thread.title_full: NorthShore Care Supply reviewed by Luann

author: Luann
title: Luann
text: I have ordered tranquality briefs for my mother who is 88 years old. I order these brief in order to keep her from getting UT infections and it has worked so far. She runs out without telling me and I have ordered through NorhShore and they are so efficent. She receives them within a day or two. I won't order these through any other company.
